bossDialog: I shall not be your adjudicator this day, traveler; your trials yet continue. Even so, I shall test your worthiness.
Ruler of {CASTLENAME}, the charges leveled against you are most grave. I pronounce you guilty, and hereby sentence you to death!
You are untested. I challenge you - trial by combat. Prove the worth of your existence.

cardBonuses.2: Your creatures have a 3% chance to ignore incoming debuffs.
cardBonuses.4: Your creatures have a 3% chance to ignore incoming debuffs.
cardBonuses.6: Your creatures have a 3% chance to ignore incoming debuffs.

master.dialog: Arbiters emit powerful auras that strengthen their allies in battle. If you wish to stand a chance against me, you'll need to pick off my Arbiters one at a time. Let's fight!
master.name: Clovis

name: Arbiter
